parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the text; index begins at 0

title: IDatumTag.IGetTextPositionAtIndex
description: Gets the text item's offset relative to note's text point.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the text; index begins at 0

returns: Pointer to an array of doubles (see Remarks )
remarks:
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
textPtX, textPtY, textPtZ
]
where these text position values are offset values from the origin of this datum tag object.
Call
IDatumTag::GetTextCount
before calling this method.
